Description: AVAILABLE NOW! JULY OR AUGUST MOVE-IN NO BROKERAGE FEE NEEDED A large 1 bed, 1 bath rental apartment available for lease on Newbury St in the Back Bay neighborhood of Boston! Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
